tasks.label: Launch Cemu
tasks.detail: Launches the game in the Cemu emulator

tasks.label: Upload to console
tasks.detail: Uploads the game to a Wii U console

tasks.label: Start gdbstub on console
tasks.detail: Uploads the gdbstub plugin to the Wii U console
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ./build/gdbstub.wps ]; then curl -L https://github.com/wiiu-env/gdbstub_plugin/releases/download/v0.1/gdbstub_plugin_v0_1.zip -o gdbstub.zip && unzip gdbstub.zip -d build && rm gdbstub.zip; fi && WIILOAD=tcp:${config:console_ip} wiiload build/gdbstub.wps

tasks.label: Resume console execution
tasks.detail: Prevents the console from getting stuck waiting for the debugger after it detaches
tasks.command: ${env:DEVKITPPC}/bin/powerpc-eabi-gdb -batch -ex "set remotetimeout 60" -ex "set tcp connect-timeout 60" -ex "target remote ${config:console_ip}:3000" -ex continue -ex quit
